items.title: Awesome Frege Updates on Dec 05 - Dec 11, 2016

items.title: Awesome Frege Updates on Oct 03 - Oct 09, 2016
items.summary: 51 awesome projects updated on Oct 03 - Oct 09, 2016
items.content_text:
### Introduction / Overview

*   [Frege (⭐3.7k)](https://github.com/Frege/frege) - Official website.

### Introduction / First Steps

*   [Getting Started (⭐3.7k)](https://github.com/Frege/frege/wiki/Getting-Started) - First steps with Frege on the command line.
*   [Examples (⭐3.7k)](https://github.com/Frege/frege/tree/master/examples) - Some code examples.
*   [Template (⭐3)](https://github.com/tfausak/fregexample) - Template for Frege projects.

### Introduction / Comparisons

*   [Frege vs. Haskell (⭐3.7k)](https://github.com/Frege/frege/wiki/Differences-between-Frege-and-Haskell) - Differences between Frege and Haskell.
*   [Frege vs. Scala](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/17905322/what-are-the-main-differences-between-scala-and-frege-in-programming-paradigms) - Differences between Scala and Frege.

### Introduction / Official Resources

*   [Language Reference](http://www.frege-lang.org/doc/Language.pdf) - Description of the language and its implementation.
*   [Standard Library API](http://www.frege-lang.org/doc/fregedoc.html) - Frege API documentation.
*   [Java Runtime API](http://www.frege-lang.org/doc/index.html) - Java API documentation.
*   [FAQ (⭐3.7k)](https://github.com/Frege/frege/wiki/Frequently-Asked-Questions) - Frequently asked questions.
*   [Wiki (⭐3.7k)](https://github.com/Frege/frege/wiki) - Official wiki.
*   [Changelog (⭐3.7k)](https://github.com/Frege/frege/wiki/New-or-Changed-Features) - Official changelog.

### Community / Chat

*   [Gitter](https://gitter.im/Frege/frege) - Gitter channel.
*   [IRC](https://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=%23frege) - IRC channel.

### Community / Questions

*   [Google Group](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/frege-programming-language) - Frege Google Group.
*   [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/frege) - Frege tag on Stack Overflow.

### Community / Social Media

*   [Twitter](https://twitter.com/fregelang) - Official Twitter account.
*   [Dierk König](https://twitter.com/mittie) - Core contributor and Groovy expert.

### Information / Articles & Blogs

*   [InfoQ](https://www.infoq.com/news/2015/08/frege-haskell-for-jvm) - InfoQ article on Frege.
*   [Frege Wiki (⭐3.7k)](https://github.com/Frege/frege/wiki/Articles) - List of more articles on the Frege wiki.
*   [Frege Programming Language](http://fregepl.blogspot.com) - Blog of Ingo Wechsung.

### Information / Books

*   [Frege Goodness](https://www.gitbook.com/book/dierk/fregegoodness/details) - Book by Dierk König.
*   [Frege Quick Reference](https://www.gitbook.com/book/ingo60/frege-quick-reference/details) - Book by Ingo Wechsung.
*   [Learn You a Frege for Great Good! (⭐51)](https://github.com/y-taka-23/learn-you-a-frege) - Frege adaptation of Learn You a Haskell for Great Good!.
*   [Frege Wiki (⭐3.7k)](https://github.com/Frege/frege/wiki/Books) - List of more books on the Frege wiki.

### Information / Conferences

*   [ICFP](http://www.icfpconference.org/) - International Conference on Functional Programming.

### Information / Courses

*   [FP101x](https://www.edx.org/course/introduction-functional-programming-delftx-fp101x-0) - Introduction to Functional Programming on edX.

### Information / Talks

*   [Overview](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1P1-HXNfFPc) - Frege, a Haskell for the JVM by Dierk König.
*   [Frege vs. Haskell](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o2qwNlVeyA4) - FregeDay: Roadmap for resolving differences between Haskell and Frege (Ingo Wechsung).
*   [ICFP Videos](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwRL68qZFfub1Ep1EScfmBw) - Videos about functional programming.
*   [Frege Wiki (⭐3.7k)](https://github.com/Frege/frege/wiki/Talks) - List of more talks on the Frege wiki.

### Libraries / Talks

*   [Frege Wiki (⭐3.7k)](https://github.com/Frege/frege/wiki/Libraries) - List of libraries on the Frege wiki.

### Libraries / Android

*   [FregeAndroid (⭐14)](https://github.com/trilogysci/FregeAndroid) - Frege interface to the Android API.
*   [frege-on-android (⭐1)](https://github.com/ppelleti/frege-on-android) - How to use Frege on Android.

### Libraries / Big Data

*   [Spark (⭐5)](https://github.com/sw1sh/frege-spark) - Apache Spark with Frege.

### Libraries / Databases

*   [Sirocco (⭐16)](https://github.com/fregelab/sirocco) - Frege library for relational databases.
*   [frege-dbc (⭐3)](https://github.com/DellCliff/frege-dbc) - JDBC with Frege.

### Libraries / Email

*   [Frege Email (⭐1)](https://github.com/y-taka-23/frege-email) - SMTP library for Frege.

### Libraries / GUI

*   [FregeFX (⭐33)](https://github.com/Frege/FregeFX) - Frege bindings for JavaFX.

### Libraries / Web Frameworks

*   [Chinook (⭐27)](https://github.com/fregelab/chinook) - Frege web framework based on SparkJava.
*   [Fregelet (⭐6)](https://github.com/mmhelloworld/fregelet) - Frege web framework based on servlet.
*   [Play (⭐20)](https://github.com/mmhelloworld/hello-play-frege) - Play framework with Frege.

### Sample Applications / Games

*   [2048 (⭐6)](https://github.com/tfausak/fr2048) - Frege clone of 2048.

### Sample Applications / Web

*   [RESTful Todo Manager (⭐5)](https://github.com/y-taka-23/restful-todo) - Task list manager written in Frege.
*   [Play Framework (⭐20)](https://github.com/mmhelloworld/hello-play-frege) - Play application written in Frege.

### Tools / Build Tools

*   [Leiningen](http://leiningen.org/) - Project automation for Frege and Clojure.
*   [Leiningen Template (⭐9)](https://github.com/Frege/frege-lein-template) - Template for frege-lein projects.

### Tools / IDEs

*   [fregIDE (⭐31)](https://github.com/Frege/eclipse-plugin/wiki/fregIDE-Tutorial) - Eclipse plugin for Frege.

### Tools / REPLs

*   [Console REPL (⭐78)](https://github.com/Frege/frege-repl) - REPL on the console.
*   [GUI REPL (⭐25)](https://github.com/Dierk/frepl-gui) - GUI based REPL.

### Tools / Unit Testing

*   [FrUnit (⭐1)](https://github.com/melrief/FrUnit) - JUnit for Frege.
items.content_html:
Introduction / Overview

  • Frege (⭐3.7k) - Official website.

Introduction / First Steps

  • Getting Started (⭐3.7k) - First steps with Frege on the command line.
  • Examples (⭐3.7k) - Some code examples.
  • Template (⭐3) - Template for Frege projects.

Introduction / Comparisons

  • Frege vs. Haskell (⭐3.7k) - Differences between Frege and Haskell.
  • Frege vs. Scala - Differences between Scala and Frege.

Introduction / Official Resources

  • Language Reference - Description of the language and its implementation.
  • Standard Library API - Frege API documentation.
  • Java Runtime API - Java API documentation.
  • FAQ (⭐3.7k) - Frequently asked questions.
  • Wiki (⭐3.7k) - Official wiki.
  • Changelog (⭐3.7k) - Official changelog.

Community / Chat

  • Stack Overflow - Frege tag on Stack Overflow.

Community / Social Media

  • Twitter - Official Twitter account.
  • Dierk König - Core contributor and Groovy expert.

Information / Articles & Blogs

  • InfoQ - InfoQ article on Frege.
  • Frege Wiki (⭐3.7k) - List of more articles on the Frege wiki.
  • Frege Programming Language - Blog of Ingo Wechsung.

  • Frege Goodness - Book by Dierk König.
  • Frege Quick Reference - Book by Ingo Wechsung.
  • Learn You a Frege for Great Good! (⭐51) - Frege adaptation of Learn You a Haskell for Great Good!.
  • Frege Wiki (⭐3.7k) - List of more books on the Frege wiki.

Information / Talks

  • Overview - Frege, a Haskell for the JVM by Dierk König.
  • Frege vs. Haskell - FregeDay: Roadmap for resolving differences between Haskell and Frege (Ingo Wechsung).
  • ICFP Videos - Videos about functional programming.
  • Frege Wiki (⭐3.7k) - List of more talks on the Frege wiki.

Libraries / Talks

  • Frege Wiki (⭐3.7k) - List of libraries on the Frege wiki.

Libraries / Android

  • FregeAndroid (⭐14) - Frege interface to the Android API.
  • frege-on-android (⭐1) - How to use Frege on Android.

Libraries / Big Data

  • Spark (⭐5) - Apache Spark with Frege.

Libraries / Databases

  • Sirocco (⭐16) - Frege library for relational databases.
  • frege-dbc (⭐3) - JDBC with Frege.

Libraries / Email

  • Frege Email (⭐1) - SMTP library for Frege.

Libraries / GUI

  • FregeFX (⭐33) - Frege bindings for JavaFX.

Libraries / Web Frameworks

  • Chinook (⭐27) - Frege web framework based on SparkJava.
  • Fregelet (⭐6) - Frege web framework based on servlet.
  • Play (⭐20) - Play framework with Frege.

Sample Applications / Games

  • 2048 (⭐6) - Frege clone of 2048.

Sample Applications / Web

  • RESTful Todo Manager (⭐5) - Task list manager written in Frege.
  • Play Framework (⭐20) - Play application written in Frege.

Tools / Build Tools

  • Leiningen - Project automation for Frege and Clojure.
  • Leiningen Template (⭐9) - Template for frege-lein projects.

Tools / IDEs

  • fregIDE (⭐31) - Eclipse plugin for Frege.

Tools / REPLs

  • Console REPL (⭐78) - REPL on the console.
  • GUI REPL (⭐25) - GUI based REPL.

Tools / Unit Testing

  • FrUnit (⭐1) - JUnit for Frege.
